description: Table with Unified Communication groups in chat conversation.

columns.name: CONVERSATION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the secure chat conversation record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: UC_GROUP_ID
columns.description: The groups (TGR records) that are involved in the conversation.

columns.name: GROUP_ACTIVE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This indicates if the group is considered active in the conversation or not


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Inactive

columns.name: GROUP_SYNC_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the last time a group's members were synchronized with the conversation.
